column4: <font color="#8EA4C8">Map Pins       :    Map Pin Size</font> <font size="16"> (Recommended '5')</font>
A common <font color="#ffcc00">[NAME]</font> plant that can be harvested to create a variety of useful recipes.

A <font color="#9BAADD">Harvesting Grounds</font> <font color="#ffcc00">[NAME]</font> plant that can be harvested to create a variety of useful recipes, harvest this plant for a chance to recieve bonus herbs!
This is a dedicated <font color="#9BAADD">[NAME]</font> Harvesting Ground. Harvest these [COUNT] plants for a chance to receieve bonus herbs!
Harvesting Grounds: This plant yielded an extra [REPLACE] herbs.
<font color="#9BAADD">Harvesting Grounds       :    Maximum Grounds of The Same Type</font>
<font color="#9BAADD">Harvesting Grounds       :    Maximum Herbs In Grounds</font>

You have just discovered a new herb!

As you explore the world, make sure to pass close by to any herbs you find along the way.

You can discover new herbs by simply passing close enough to display the 'Gather Ingredients' message on the screen.

Once you have discovered a herb, Botanist will remember its location and display 3D Markers and map pins for it when you need it.

Thank you for installing Botanist!

Please make sure to check the mod menu and update the settings to your liking.

As you explore the world and play through the game, further tutorials and tips will be shown on screen to help you navigate the mod and understand it's features.

Tutorials can be disabled or re-enabled using the toggles in the 'Tutorials' page of the mod menu.

For now, why don't you go and find your first herb!
